column4: Hello. I am trying to install ubuntu on an external usb harddisk. I have tried it before on another distribution. The perpetual trouble is after the install, you need to create an initrd that preloads some usb modules. However, I have now booted the live cd, and chrooted to my new install, but I find no mkinitrd script. What do I do?
no, I found out how to use mkinitramfs :)
